candidates.name: Newsletter signups:
candidates.acceptedAnswer: If you subscribe, we collect your email address and your consent. You can unsubscribe at any time using the link in our emails or by contacting us.

candidates.name: Support/contact:
candidates.acceptedAnswer: If you email us, we receive the information you provide (e.g., your email address and message contents).

candidates.name: Basic server logs:
candidates.acceptedAnswer: Our hosting may log standard request information (IP address, user agent, referrer, timestamps) for security and reliability. These logs are retained briefly and used for troubleshooting and abuse prevention.
